item.title: SDP4Bit: Toward 4-bit Communication Quantization in Sharded Data Parallelism for LLM Training
item.description: SDP4Bit achieves up to 4.08x speedup in LLM training by quantizing weight differences and gradients to ~4 bits, maintaining accuracy.
